value:
Every slot on your team must be
filled by a Hero.

Duplicate Heroes are not allowed
in your regiment.

You can include only one ally
that can use Sing or Dance
on your team.

You can include only one ally that
can use Savior.

In order to join this event, you will
need a Fighter Badge. You can
earn it by playing Favor Battles
in the coliseum.

$aSelect $a0 of the opponent's
teams to veto.

Select a team to do battle. Teams your
opponent has vetoed cannot be used.

Your opponent's status is not shown
on this screen.
Be careful to veto the right teams!

Summoner Duels S:
A Summoner Duels battle to earn
Glory. You can also veto your
opponent's teams.

You can battle until you've
accumulated three defeats in the
active season.

Editing Your Teams:
・Create four teams with a total
of 20 Heroes, five per team.
・Duplicate Heroes are not
allowed in your regiment.
・Each team can include only one
ally that can use Sing or Dance
and one ally with Savior.

Vetoing Teams:
・You can select two of your
opponent's four teams to veto.
They cannot be used.
・Two of your teams will also be
vetoed. Select one of your
remaining teams and battle!

Glory and Tier:
・ Your Glory will change based
on your battle results.
・ Your Tier is based on your
Glory.
・ When a new season begins,
you will start the season with
an amount of Glory based on
your Tier.

Maximizing Glory:
・ The amount of Glory lost on
a defeat is based on your Tier.
・ On a defeat, Glory lost can be
decreased with a higher score
・ An opponent with a higher Tier
will let you earn more Glory for
victory and lose less on a defeat.

Tier Thresholds:
After you've reached Tiers 4, 7,
10, and 13, you will not be
demoted to a lower Tier even if
you lose a battle after that point.

Bonus Legendary/Mythic Heroes:
Include one of the Heroes from
the current season on your team
to ignore your first defeat (so you
can suffer a maximum of four
defeats instead of three). You also
lose less Glory when defeated,
saving you 40 Glory each defeat.

Bonus Legendary/Mythic Heroes:
If just one of the bonus Legendary
or Mythic Heroes is on any of your
four teams, their bonus will take
effect.

(Whether or not the team is used
or even if it is vetoed, the bonus
will still take effect.)

Free 5★ summon after 40 summons on every
Special / Legendary / Mythic / Hero Fest event.
